author: Matthew Cappucci
title: Cyclone Harold slams Tonga, third island nation hit in four days
description: After ravaging parts of Vanuatu and Fiji early this week, Tonga was Harold’s latest target.
content: After ravaging Vanuatu and Fiji early this week, tropical cyclone Harold lashed Tonga on Thursday, local time. Damaging winds, hazardous storm surge and flooding rains were expected in the tropical island chain, which is home to a little more than 100,000 peo… [+3817 chars]
